post.description: Register user with username, email and strong password

403.description: Exception thrown when the user is already logged in

409.description: Thrown when user is already exists with a specific username or email, or you want to use an illegal username

post.description: Login user with email and password

403.description: User is already logged in error

400.description: The user in not verified yet

post.description: Search after forums and users, is noting is found, returns an [ [], [] ]

200.description: Returned search results, can be empty array

message.example: You have no permission to use path: POST /declineFriendRequest/{requestCreatorName}
Full name cannot be longer than 100 characters!

200.description: Returns and object containing all the user's information except email and _id

put.description: Unban a user from the forum. LOGIN REQUIRED

message.example: User is not banned from this forum

get.description: Get recommended forums. By default it is 5 forums. If you want to get more, you can specify the number of forums you want to get in the query parameters

message.example: You have no permission to use path: POST /thread

400.description: Forum's name, thread's name or the content field is empty

message.example: You are not allowed to update the creation date.

get.description: Returns the data of the chat by id. LOGIN REQUIRED

You have no permission to use path: DELETE /chat/65dc8b87ea70db4fabe4adb6
You are not allowed to delete this chat

post.description: Retrieves the mutual chats between the caller user and another one. NOT A STANDALONE ROUTE, IT IS USED WITH /chat. LOGIN REQUIRED

message.example: You have no permission to use path: POST /createOrRetrieveChat

404.description: You have no friend with name, or no user user found error

message.example: You have no friend with name: sanyi

post.description: Create a new chat. LOGIN REQUIRED

post.description: Add a friend to the chat. LOGIN REQUIRED

message.example: You have no permission to use path: POST /chat/addFriend/

404.description: User not found or chat not found or you have no friend with a specific name

You have no permission to use path: PATCH /comment/{commentId}
